title: Direction of magnetic force on proton and pion

content.description:
An isolated, neutral lambda particle (A0) is moving to the right with speed v. It then decays into a proton and a pion (A0 → p+ + π - ). The following are the masses of the three particles:
Lambda: 1115.7 MeV/c2
Proton: 938.3 MeV/c2
Pion: 139.6 MeV/c2
content.question: At some later time, the proton and pion are both moving to the right in the plane of the page when they enter a magnetic field directed out of the page. Which of the following describes the directions of the magnetic forces on the proton and pion at the instant they enter the field?

choices.label:
Proton: toward the top of the page 
Pion: toward the top of the page

Proton: toward the top of the page 
Pion: toward the bottom of the page
Proton: toward the bottom of the page Pion: toward the bottom of the page
Proton: toward the bottom of the page Pion: toward the top of the page

content.answer: Proton: toward the bottom of the page Pion: toward the top of the page
